r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $539.5K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Enviroservices. The average
  contract duration was 0.8 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $61.6K. The longest
  contract was 1.76 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $269.7K.
lookup_name: 'ENVIROSERVICES'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '539.5K'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '57'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '15'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '26%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '79%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1.33'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '479.1K'
s424_mean_duration: '0.8'
s421_mean_contract_value: '61.6K'
s425_max_duration: '1.76'
s422_max_contract_value: '269.7K'
---
